name: Bullet Space (tanatb)
description:
so, this game...

  • it’s bullet-heck-ish
  • it’s rogue-like-ish
  • it’s a top-down shooter
  • and it’s in space

controls:

  •  WASD -> Movement
  • Left Click -> Shoot
  • Mouse -> Aim
  • Shift -> Dash

credits:

  • textures - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/snaps-art-hd-sci-fi...
  • animations - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/basic-motions-free-pack-1542...
  • models - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/low-poly-ultimate-pack-54733
  • audio - https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-1
  • audio - https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack
  • audio - https://outspacer.itch.io/platformer-sfx
  • audio - https://yadu.itch.io/mini-loops
